snippet: One Grand, a new store in Narrowsburg, N.Y., sells titles suggested by a slew of famous names — including Tilda Swinton and Edmund White.
abstract: Journalist and editor Aaron Hicklin is set to open intimate bookstore in Narrowsburg, NY, called One Grand.
lead_paragraph: One Grand, a new store in Narrowsburg, N.Y., sells titles suggested by a slew of famous names — including Tilda Swinton and Edmund White.

headline.main: A Bookshop Where Everything Is Recommended
headline.print_headline: Not One Loser on the Shelves
